News.Title: HP Telecom India: Shares List at 6.53% Premium on NSE SME
News.Summary: HP Telecom India shares debuted on NSE SME at ₹115.05, a 6.53% premium over the IPO price of ₹108. The ₹34.23 crore IPO was oversubscribed 1.91 times. Proceeds will be used for working capital and general corporate purposes.
